ruleChapterList:
<js>var list=[];//六月大佬提供技术支持
JSON.parse(result).forEach(a=>{var ch_list=a.chapters.map(x=>({vol:a.volume_id,chap:x.chapter_id,name:a.volume_name+" "+x.chapter_name}));
Array.prototype.push.apply(list,ch_list);});
list.map(ch=>({name:ch.name,link:"http://v3api.dmzj.com/novel/download/"+@get:{id}+"_"+ch.vol+"_"+ch.chap+".txt"}))</js>
*
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
result="最近 / 更新::/novel/recentUpdate/searchPage-1.json&&";
www="http://v3api.dmzj.com/novel/tag.json";
tmp=JSON.parse(java.ajax(www));
for(i=0;i<tmp.length;i++){result+="标签 / "+tmp[i].tag_name+"::/novel/rank/0/"+tmp[i].tag_id+"/searchPage-1.json&&"}
</js>
